title: This Week's Top Stories - Andrew Cuomo's Harassment Scandal & Idolatry and the Big Lie at CPAC 2021
itunes:title: This Week's Top Stories - Andrew Cuomo's Harassment Scandal & Idolatry and the Big Lie at CPAC 2021
description:
New York Governor Andrew Cuomo faces sexual harassment allegations, QAnon followers find another reason to storm Congress, and CPAC attendees fawn over a golden statue of Donald Trump.
